channel.title: Walk Travel on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Walk Travel on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Keem Valley
item.description: Tropical temperatures once again today 22c can’t believe it at this time of year. A furley steep start the walk but once we reached the cliff edge the walking was much easier. {{ more }} We walked from Keem beach up along the cliffs and back down through the valley about 4 miles inall, and once a fantastic day. Looking out over the Atlantic the views where spectacular. Stopped on the way back for the necessary coffee in Gielty’s.
